description: Stops a batch transform job. When Amazon SageMaker receives a StopTransformJob request, the status of the job changes to Stopping. After Amazon SageMaker stops the job, the status is set to Stopped. When you stop a batch transform job before it is completed, Amazon SageMaker doesn't store the job's output in Amazon S3.

parameters.name: TransformJobName
parameters.description: The name of the batch transform job to stop.
